meanings.definition: Preserved or cured with salt or brine
meanings.sent1: The corned beef was salty and delicious.
meanings.sent2: She bought a can of corned soup for lunch.
meanings.sent3: The corned pickles added a tangy flavor to the sandwich.
meanings.sent4: The corned fish was a savory treat for the guests.
meanings.sent5: The corned olives were a hit at the party.

meanings.definition: To preserve or cure with salt or brine
meanings.sent1: They corned the meat to make it last longer.
meanings.sent2: He learned how to corn vegetables for the winter.
meanings.sent3: She corned the fruits to enjoy them all year round.
meanings.sent4: Corned foods can be a tasty addition to any meal.
meanings.sent5: The chef corned the duck for a unique flavor.

meanings.definition: To season with salt or brine
meanings.sent1: The chef corned the dish with just the right amount of salt.
meanings.sent2: Corned vegetables are a great side dish for any meal.
meanings.sent3: He corned the chicken with a special brine recipe.
meanings.sent4: She corned the soup to enhance its flavor.
meanings.sent5: Corned meat is a popular choice for many recipes.
